I'm leaving. Goin' faraway.
But when I come back
I'll be a better man! This is goodbye!{PAUSE}Hey! Childhood friend!
You better take
good care of {Tifa}!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:62}); // Hey!! Open up!
C'mon baby!!{PAUSE}It's me! Johnny!
Mom!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:45}); // Wooah geez, I'm blitzed.
I jes love them homemade cocktails.
But they sure do creep up on ya.

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:64}); // Johnny
I thought you were something
a little better than this,
but you're just a punk kid after all.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:66}); // But {Tifa} doesn't think so.{PAUSE}Why does she ask you n' not me?{PAUSE}If {Tifa}'s in trouble
then I'LL help her.{PAUSE}But then I guess not.
She's nothing to me.{PAUSE}Not those memories beneath
the stars when we were kids
or all the stuff we talked about.{PAUSE}About all I got is the sake
that she poured me everyday
I went to the bar.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:67}); // Crap!{PAUSE}Hey! You!
Don't think you can just walk outta here
like that!{PAUSE}Shhi-! You busted a promise!!
'n' you made {Tifa} cry!!

ops.mr: Execute script #%3 in extern group %1 (priority %2/6) - Only if the script is not already running|_script(groupID)|priority|scriptID

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:68}); // Johnny
Oh yeah!?{PAUSE}That may be but you ain't walkin' away
from here!{PAUSE}Urgh! You made a promise, didn't ya!?
'n' don' you fergit that {Tifa}
like an angel.
An angel of this slum!

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:73}); // AhJohnny's gone.
You look a little disappointed.{PAUSE}I don't like to say it myself but,
I'm just a lonely guy
when I'm not drinking.
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:72}); // I hope he doesn't get hurt.{PAUSE}That worries me the most.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // Now that you mention it,
there used to be an outside TV monitor
here in the slums.{PAUSE}But that {Barret},
busted it up.{PAUSE}Shot it up with that
weird machine gun hand of his.
Blam, blam, blam.{PAUSE}I think it was when President Shinra was on.{PAUSE}He was on again this morning, too, you know.{PAUSE}{Tifa} better
watch out for her TV.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:60}); // There's a TV in there, but
my cheap aunt won't let me in the house.
Look for yourself.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // I wasn't even done with my drink.
I didn't even pay my bill

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // Oh &$#&@!!
What the hell's wrong tonight!!{PAUSE}I thought that long blackout
was strange.{PAUSE}They say a Mako Reactor was
destroyed above.{PAUSE}I was jes sittin' here drinkin',
watchin' the news by myself.{PAUSE}'n' all of a sudden
I get kicked outta the &*%$ store.
What's up with that!?

Wait a minute!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:70}); // Cause, I'll be back!!
Don't make her cry, dammit!!

'n' don' fergit it!

dialogStrings: Sector 7 Slums

{Barret}
All right!!
You losers go on ahead!!

{Barret}
OK!
Go on ahead.

{Barret}
Heh heh{PAUSE}You wanna meet your little baby?
{CHOICE}Little baby?
{CHOICE}Out of my way!

{Barret}
Heh!
Jus' calm down.{PAUSE}Can't have people suspectin' us.

{Barret}
Hey!
Don't act like you don't know what I mean!{PAUSE}I'm tellin' you

{Barret}
You! {Cloud}!!
Get off your slow-movin' ass!!

{Barret}
The hell're you doin', boy?
The operation's already started!!

I'm not opening up.
Go away!!

Oh &$#&@!!
What the hell's wrong tonight!!{PAUSE}I thought that long blackout
was strange.{PAUSE}They say a Mako Reactor was
destroyed above.{PAUSE}I was jes sittin' here drinkin',
watchin' the news by myself.{PAUSE}'n' all of a sudden
I get kicked outta the &*%$ store.
What's up with that!?

Wooah geez, I'm blitzed.
I jes love them homemade cocktails.
But they sure do creep up on ya.

Did you hear?
{CHOICE}Don't care
{CHOICE}No, what?

There's a news update.
They say that there was a terrorist explosion
up above, and that this time
it was a Mako Reactor!!

You know what this means?
{CHOICE}Don't care
{CHOICE}No, what?

Ya see, I keep on top of these things,
an' if ya ask me{PAUSE}if you knock out Midgar's power,
then all of its computers and signals are
going to be knocked out, too.{PAUSE}Financially there must've been about
a billion gil worth of damage.{PAUSE}An' that ain't all!!
A lotta innocent people got killed, too!{PAUSE}If the explosion had been in the middle
of the night, that woulda been one thing.
At least the people coulda gone in their sleep.

This Mako explosion has really
sent Midgar into a fit.
Oh, well excuse ME!

Explosions! Explosions!
Oh Man!
AVALANCHE is so cool!

Hey!!
Heh heh heh
Say, you're kinda cute.
Cutie pie

I wasn't even done with my drink.
I didn't even pay my bill

All's quiet!!
Shh, I'm spying now!{PAUSE}OH!!
There's something!!
DANGER!! ALERT!!

Did you hear?
{CHOICE}'Bout what?
{CHOICE}Don't care

About that little girl named {Tifa}
and that bar called '7th Heaven'.{PAUSE}I'm not only informed, I'm kinda nosey too.
Anyhow, I got the scoop.{PAUSE}You wanna hear?
{CHOICE}You bet!
{CHOICE}Don't care

That {Barret} and
three of his henchmen
are like this sometimes.{PAUSE}Suddenly, they throw out a customer and
start talking trash to him.
It's strange, if you ask me.
And that place always smells like gun powder.{PAUSE}It's dangerous, I tell you.
They must be doing terrible things in there.

Oh really?
Well, aren't you a cool one!

There's a TV in there, but
my cheap aunt won't let me in the house.
Look for yourself.

Now that you mention it,
there used to be an outside TV monitor
here in the slums.{PAUSE}But that {Barret},
busted it up.{PAUSE}Shot it up with that
weird machine gun hand of his.
Blam, blam, blam.{PAUSE}I think it was when President Shinra was on.{PAUSE}He was on again this morning, too, you know.{PAUSE}{Tifa} better
watch out for her TV.

Hey!! Open up!
C'mon baby!!{PAUSE}It's me! Johnny!
Mom!!

SHHH!!
Wait a minute!!

Johnny
I thought you were something
a little better than this,
but you're just a punk kid after all.

Just what the hell do you think
you're doing
with my little {Tifa}?{PAUSE}And now?
{CHOICE}We're just friends.
{CHOICE}What's it to you?

But {Tifa} doesn't think so.{PAUSE}Why does she ask you n' not me?{PAUSE}If {Tifa}'s in trouble
then I'LL help her.{PAUSE}But then I guess not.
She's nothing to me.{PAUSE}Not those memories beneath
the stars when we were kids
or all the stuff we talked about.{PAUSE}About all I got is the sake
that she poured me everyday
I went to the bar.

Crap!{PAUSE}Hey! You!
Don't think you can just walk outta here
like that!{PAUSE}Shhi-! You busted a promise!!
'n' you made {Tifa} cry!!

Johnny
Oh yeah!?{PAUSE}That may be but you ain't walkin' away
from here!{PAUSE}Urgh! You made a promise, didn't ya!?
'n' don' you fergit that {Tifa}
like an angel.
An angel of this slum!

Johnny
I'm leaving. Goin' faraway.
But when I come back
I'll be a better man! This is goodbye!{PAUSE}Hey! Childhood friend!
You better take
good care of {Tifa}!

Cause, I'll be back!!
Don't make her cry, dammit!!

I'll be back, I say!!
'n' don' fergit it!
I hope he doesn't get hurt.{PAUSE}That worries me the most.

AhJohnny's gone.
You look a little disappointed.{PAUSE}I don't like to say it myself but,
I'm just a lonely guy
when I'm not drinking.

Yesterday, everyone in town was
peeking at the two of you
from outside the bar.{PAUSE}{Tifa}'s childhood friend.
That's a good one!

Listen!
If there isn't anyone to listen,
what's the use of
getting gossip on everyone!?{PAUSE}Yeah, and you Mr. I-don't-care!{PAUSE}I'll get a little more information that would
pique even your interest.
You wait and see!

H, hey!!
Keep your mitts off of Marlene!!

Ahh!
Now I ain't got no one to pick on!

When it comes down to itI'm gutless.
I'm still just a no-good kid.

We're closed today.
Come back tomorrow.

Don't be taken in by the Shinra.
Mako energy will not last forever.
Mako is the life of the Planet
and that life is finite.
The end is coming.
Saviors of the Planet: AVALANCHE

{Cloud}
What crappy handwriting.
And look at all this graffiti!
